Name: Voice Visualizer
About the game: The Voice Visualizer allows you to visualize your voice with a personal image. Make your stream come to life without the obligation of a webcam. Features The image is vibrating to the sound of your voice, to show the viewer that you are talking Personalize your background with several effects and colors ... Or make it transparent to save some space or to have a clean layout You can customize how much your voice is affecting this image Create up to three profiles for several situations and adjustments Present your current emotions to your audience with up to six emotes
